author: The Telegraph
title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £30,000 Menorca house party
text: Menorca is tipped to be the destination for 2016, and next summer luxury villa specialist Scott Williams ( scottwilliams.co.uk ) will offer villas across the Balearic island for the first time. The prize, worth more than £30,000, is a spectacular house party for 22 at the island’s hottest new property, Cugó Gran. A new breed of 'super villa', nothing has been left to chance, this stunning house comes complete with a fabulous team to ensure you have a great time – included in your prize is a chauffeur driven car at your beck and call, discreet housemaids, food on tap from your own private chef and a well-informed concierge who can book anything from sailing to a private riding lesson. If that isn’t enough, our prize also includes two charters of your own private yacht, and a private Menorcan horse show on your own estate. If this prize doesn’t make you the most popular in your group, then we’re not quite sure what will… How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . The prize Our Ultimate House Party for 22 guests at Cugó Gran with Scott Williams includes three nights to enjoy the villa as your own, with all the house has to offer. Our fantastic prize includes: Three nights for 22 people, sharing Cugó Gran’s 11 luxurious en suite bedrooms, featuring sumptuous beds and linens. The villa sleeps, and caters for, 22 Enjoy Cugó Gran as your own, with interiors influenced by the Mediterranean, decorated with bouquets of flowers and herbs picked from the 250-acre estate’s own lavender fields, greenhouses and herb gardens. Outside, there’s a 26-metre outdoor heated swimming pool, terraces for outdoor dining, a barbecue area, a croquet lawn and children’s play area complete with tree house, as well as a gym, massage treatment rooms and more. Cugó Gran has 180° sea views with Mallorca on the horizon and is located just 10 minutes by car from the capital, Mahón. All meals are included, prepared by your own professional chef Your staff also include a private concierge team, a butler, a driver on call day and night and a discreet daily maid service During your stay, you’ll be treated to your own private Menorcan horse display on the estate. A spectacle that really brings the strong horse traditions of Menorca home, this will be a stunning event to enjoy with your guests Our fabulous prize also includes a complimentary private boat trip on a 50ft Pershing yacht, which is yours for two days, complete with skipper. Accommodating up to 11, guests can cruise one of the deepest harbours in the world, and view the beautiful island of Menorca from the sea, stopping off in secret bays as you wish The prize provider With more than 200 handpicked villas and houses across France, Greece, Italy, Menorca, Mallorca, Ibiza, mainland Spain, Morocco and Turkey, Scott Williams specialise in offering unique access to extraordinary houses in some of the most beautiful destinations in Europe and beyond. Founded by Victoria Hooberman and Maymie White in 2007 and born from a bulging black book of contacts, a passion for beautiful houses and years of experience in both the luxury and travel worlds, each property in the Scott Williams portfolio has been hand-picked for individuality and special features – whether it’s a remarkable view, a fabulous pool or a private beach. Big or small, these villas all offer something extraordinary, setting them apart from the average holiday house. Edited each year and highly selective, the collection represents some of the finest addresses around, where service is paramount, both in the booking process and in destination. Terms and conditions 1.The prize is for a three-night stay at Cugó Gran for up to 22 people, with arrival after 4pm and departure before 10am. 2. Included is accommodation, three breakfasts, two lunches and two dinners for up to 22 people. 3. Staff include a private concierge team, a professional chef, a butler, an eight seated chauffeured vehicle on call between 10am-midnight each day, and a discreet daily maid service. 4. A private Menorcan Horse Display on the estate is included. 5. Two complimentary half-day private boat trips on a 50ft Pershing yacht with skipper is included. Accommodating up to 11 guests, two trips on Saturday and Sunday morning are included in the prize. Fuel, food and soft drinks on board is included. Alcoholic drinks extra. 6. Transfers to and from the airport are included. 7. The prize excludes flights and alcoholic drinks. 8. The prize is subject to availability, valid for travel between 1 March – 30 November 2016 excluding 13 June – 12 September 2016. The prize must be booked by 31 January 2016 and dates cannot be amended once booked. 9. There is no cash alternative. 10. Also subject to Scott Williams booking terms and conditions which are listed at: http://www.scottwilliams.co.uk/conditions.cfm Telegraphtravel
